00025 DownFile::DownFile(const KURL &url)   
00026 {  
00027 kdDebug() << "DownFile -> url -> " << url << endl;
00028 kdDebug() << "DownFile -> host -> " << url.host() << endl;      
00029 kdDebug() << "DownFile -> FileName -> " << url.fileName() << endl;    
00030     downloadfile = new QFile( url.fileName() );
00031     downloadfile->open( IO_WriteOnly );
00032     
00033     http = new QHttp(this);
00034     http->setHost(url.host());
00035     http->get( url.path(),downloadfile); 
00036     connect(http, SIGNAL(done(bool)), this, SLOT(handleDone(bool)));  
00037

00051 void DownFile::handleDone(bool error)
00052 {
00053      downloadfile->close();
00054 kdDebug() << "Download Finish !!!!!!!!!! "<< endl; 
00055      emit Finished(error);        
00056 }
